definition: Changping district of Beijing, formerly Changping county
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Xu Jinglei prosecution, said Xu Jinglei a living in the town of Changping District, Nan Shao.
sentences.chinese: 老徐起訴說，老徐一家居住在昌平區南邵鎮。

sentences.english: I live in Changping district, Tiantong Wan.
My family is Changping area Xiaotangshan.
sentences.chinese: 我家是昌平區小湯山的。
